Retains query profiles.

package Aura.Sql

 Methods

Adds a profile to the profiler.

addProfile(string $text, float $time, array $bind, string $trace) : mixed

Parameters

$text

string

The text (typically an SQL query) being profiled.

$time

float

The elapsed time in seconds.

$bind

array

The data that was used.

$trace

string

An exception backtrace as a string.

Returns

mixed

Calls a user function and and profile it.

call(\Aura\Sql\callable $func, string $text, array $bind) : mixed

Parameters

$func

\Aura\Sql\callable

The user function to call.

$text

string

The text of the SQL query.

$bind

array

The data that was used by the function.

Returns

mixed

Executes a PDOStatement and profiles it.

exec(PDOStatement $stmt, array $bind) : mixed

Parameters

$stmt

\PDOStatement

The PDOStatement to execute and profile.

$bind

array

The data that was bound into the statement.

Returns

mixed

Returns all the profiles.

getProfiles() : array

Returns

array

Is the profiler active?

isActive() : bool

Returns

bool

Turns the profiler on and off.

setActive(bool $active) : void

Parameters

$active

bool

True to turn on, false to turn off.
